price: Oya! Ahubwo ibyo bakoraga (ibyaha) byatwikiriye imitima yabo.
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
